name: A Promise
description:
A peek behind the curtain of a world in turmoil.

Jakob lived a full life as a hunter. Now at the edge of eternity, he has one more duty to fulfill. But before all that, Judgement gives him a brief respite of warmer memories.

Made for a budding November game jam, the only other participant was the event host himself. Check out his game at https://malicthegreat.itch.io/avoid
